name: Bank Robbery Real Car Driver Escape Shooting Game
name_original: Bank Robbery Real Car Driver Escape Shooting Game
description:
Roll up sleeves for the most daring bank robbery and police car escape missions in huge city. Rise from slammer of ghetto life to plan the biggest gold heist & bank robbery. Explore the dark, seedy and ruthless underworld of crime city.

Join hands with notorious mafia gangsters and wage war against law enforcement to seek vendetta. Challenge your guts for grand theft and intriguing shootout missions in suburban town. Steal cars from city streets, rob gold and diamonds from big bank. Drive luxury car to the city bank and lookout for security guards. Shoot police officers in killer action inside bank. Break all rules to obey traffic lights while driving car in big 3D city. Plan a blockbuster bank robbery after grand car theft and then escape from chasing police cars.

Explore huge urban sprawl ranging from glitz to ghetto in this city crime simulator game. After grand heist in bank robbery, getaway from chasing police cars to reach safe house. Earn reputation of criminal boss and rule the crime city. Rise to the top of criminals pile and finish other cartel members. Enjoy the wildest adventures in this thrilling robbers vs cops game.


Game Features:
10 intriguing bank robbery and car escape levels
Epic police shootout missions inside bank
Incredible controls for car driving and shooting
Huge open world environment and realistic crime city
Unique mixer of action shooting and auto driving
High quality 3D graphics and immersive gameplay

Kindly give us your feedback in the reviews section so that we may improve our games in future releases.
